#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y <<  endl
#define N 1000004

using namespace std;

int a[N];
int k, n;

bool puedo(long long temp){
	
	long long ct = 0;
	for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)ct += temp/a[i];	
	return ct >= n;	
}

int main(){

	while(cin>>k>>n){
		
		for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)scanf("%d", &a[i]);

		long long lo = 0, hi = 1000000000000LL, me;
		while(lo < hi){
				
			me = lo + (hi - lo)/2;
			if(puedo(me))hi = me;
			else lo = me + 1;
			
		}
		
		cout << lo << endl;
	}

}
